attributes.action: Fire Toby Young for ableist comments.
attributes.additional_details: Young has referred to children with learning difficulties as "illiterate troglodytes"and complaining that schools having to give access to children in wheelchairs is an example of "ghastly" political correctness.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, belive Toby Young should be fired. This is due to ableist comments which prove he is unqualified for the position within the university regulator.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments.

If you're concerned about the process for appointments to the Board of the Office for Students, you may wish to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/208774
